items.sentence: Have you ever thought that you might like to be an astronaut?
The African elephant has bigger ears than the Asian elephant.
We wanted to go for a walk, but it was raining cats and dogs.
This is all a big mix up. I'm not the guy you're looking for.
I can think of a lot of reasons why we shouldn't leave early.
You should tell Tom that Mary is planning on taking pictures.
A man's worth does not lie in what he has, but in what he is.
I'm sorry to bother you, but I would like to ask you a favor.
I don't think it's easy to form your own opinion on an issue.
If you leave now, I'm sure you'll be caught in a traffic jam.
